Questionnaire Example Data

questionnaire_example.Rd

A sample dataset containing responses from a global questionnaire. This demo data is provided for playing with our calculator and represents typical survey data that we expect you to have. It includes responses on transportation, energy usage, dietary habits, clothing consumption, household demographics, and other lifestyle factors.

Usage

questionnaire_example

Format

A tibble with 50 rows and 33 variables:

RecordedDate

chr; Date and time when the response was recorded, in the format "dd/mm/yyyy HH:MM".

T_01_CarUsage

dbl; Self-reported level of car usage.

T_02_CarType

dbl; Categorical indicator of the type of car owned or used.

T_03_CarDistance

dbl; Reported distance travelled by car.

T_04_PublicTransport

dbl; Frequency or rating of public transport usage.

T_05_PublicTransport

dbl; Secondary measure of public transport usage.

T_06_AirTravelLong

dbl; Frequency or extent of long-distance air travel.

T_07_AirTravelShort

chr; Categorical description of short-distance air travel (e.g., "7-10 flights", "More than 10 flights").

T_08_LongDistanceTra

dbl; Measure of long-distance travel by other means.

PETS_4

dbl; Count or rating related to pet ownership (e.g., number of pets).

PETS_5

dbl; Additional measure related to pet ownership.

E1_Electricity Usage

dbl; Self-reported electricity usage level.

EH_02_ElectricityBil_1

dbl; Electricity bill amount (first measurement).

EH_05_NaturalGasBill_1

dbl; Water bill amount (first measurement).

EH_07_WaterBill

dbl; Natural gas bill amount (first measurement).

F_01_DietaryHabits_5

dbl; Score or frequency related to a specific dietary habit.

F_01_DietaryHabits_6

dbl; Score or frequency for another dietary habit.

F_01_DietaryHabits_7

dbl; Score or frequency for another dietary habit.

F_01_DietaryHabits_4

dbl; Score or frequency for another dietary habit.

CL_01_ClothingPurcha

dbl; Frequency or quantity of clothing purchases.

CL_03_MonthlyEx_9

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 9).

CL_03_MonthlyEx_10

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 10).

CL_03_MonthlyEx_11

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 11).

CL_03_MonthlyEx_12

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 12).

CL_03_MonthlyEx_13

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 13).

CL_03_MonthlyEx_14

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 14).

CL_03_MonthlyEx_15

dbl; Monthly expenditure on clothing (item 15).

SD_06_HouseholdSize_17

dbl; Primary measure of household size.

SD_06_HouseholdSize_18

dbl; Secondary measure of household size.

SD_06_HouseholdSize_19

dbl; Tertiary measure of household size.

SD_07_Country

chr; Country of the respondent.

SD_08_ZipCode

dbl; Zip code of the respondent.

EH_03_ElectricityBil_1

dbl; Additional measure of electricity billing amount.

EH_06_NaturalGasBill_1

dbl; Additional measure of natural gas billing amount.

Source

Demo data generated for use with the SECFC calculator. This data reflects typical survey responses collected globally.
